title: Ticket #6761: Change condor_q JSON output to make one large JSON array
description:
A user submitted a pull request to change the json output to a large array to avoid post processing.

I put the pull request on V8_7-json-pr20

Please review and merge as appropriate.

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/20
remarks:
2018-Sep-12 15:06:26 by jfrey:
I don't see this branch in the main git repo.

2018-Sep-20 15:34:27 by jfrey:
This patch breaks reading ads from a file or a single schedd. This would be easy to fix.

The XML output has similar issues with the -global flag.

2018-Sep-20 15:52:35 by jfrey:
Printing in new ClassAd format with -global also has problems.
check_ins:
2018-Oct-22 15:24   Check-in [55603]: Docs for condor_q -global output for JSON, XML, and new ClassAds #6761 (By Jaime Frey )
2018-Sep-20 16:54   Check-in [55448]: Fix condor_q -global output in XML, JSON, and new ClassAds format. #6761 Print job ads from multiple schedds in a single list. This fix was inspired by a submission from daveh86 at github. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: tim
